name: shoppingMate App
description:
A browser-based shopping list app, which can be used to split the list. Shopping mates can select shopping aisle categories and tick off items at the same time.

Built using Create-React-App on the client side, connecting to an API managing data in MongoDB using Express server and Mongoose.

name: Web Developer Portfolio
description:
The page you are looking at:
